About

My name is Josh Martin and I am a Designer from Pittsburgh, working in Chicago.

I work primarily in website/app UI/UX, branding, and front-end development.

Currently

Most of my time is spent as Creative Director at Threadmeup where I lead branding and product design, as well as oversee Marketing. A few hours here and there are spent building web projects at TeamJosh.

Previously, Lead UI/UX Engineer at Chicago Sun-Times (2013-2015), Front-End Developer at Power2Switch (2013)
